price: and I will feel distressed and my tongue will not be fluent, so send Aaron along [to help me].
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
